name: Perigee Global
tag_list: web-design, web-development, web-hosting, internet-solutions, managed-hosting, hosted-email
overview:
Perigee Global is a professional internet solutions firm offering custom web design and managed hosting solutions and applications for business.

The company is based in Long Island, NY with deep community roots and a rich relationship with local business. It seeks to provide a comprehensive web design process to clients that are looking to build a new or existing business online. In addition to websites, it provides managed hosting solutions allowing small businesses to have many core business functions available online or from the cloud, whether that is email, voice, instant message, collaboration/sharing or inter-connected offices.
